snippet: The remains of a man who confessed he was the Boston Strangler match the DNA profile of bodily fluids found at the last of the crime scenes attributed to the serial killer.
abstract: Boston law enforcement officials announce remains of Albert DeSalvo match DNA profile of seminal fluid found at last of crime scenes attributed to the Boston Strangler; convicted rapist DeSalvo confessed to strangler murders but was killed in prison and never prosecuted for them.
lead_paragraph: The remains of a man who confessed he was the Boston Strangler match the DNA profile of bodily fluids found at the last of the crime scenes attributed to the serial killer.

headline.main: Massachusetts: DNA Match Made in Strangler Case
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: DNA Match Made In Strangler Case
